references.paper_title: Guicourse: From general vision language models to versatile gui agents
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for building versatile GUI agents using general vision language models, directly addressing the core challenge of the current work.

references.paper_title: InternVL: Scaling up vision foundation models and aligning for generic visual-linguistic tasks
references.reason: InternVL is a foundational vision-language model used in this research, hence its significance as a primary model.

references.paper_title: Qwen2-vl: Enhancing vision-language model's perception of the world at any resolution
references.reason: Qwen2-VL is another important vision-language model used as a backbone model for the experiments, thus playing a vital role in this work.

references.paper_title: On the effects of data scale on UI control agents
references.reason: This paper investigates the impact of data scale on GUI agent performance, providing insights into the data requirements for effective training, a key aspect of the current study.

references.paper_title: AndroidWorld: A dynamic benchmarking environment for autonomous agents
references.reason: AndroidWorld is a challenging online benchmark used to evaluate the performance of GUI agents, hence its importance in assessing the efficacy of the proposed approach.
